content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM recognizes that the internet provides unique opportunities to participate in interactive discussions and share information on many topics using a wide variety of social media. However, it is important to understand that employees' use of social media can pose risks to EPAM's confidential and proprietary information, reputation, and brands, can expose the company to discrimination and harassment claims, and can jeopardize the company's compliance with business rules and laws. Accordingly, to minimize these risks, EPAM expects its employees to adhere to the following guidelines regarding social media use.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Application of other Policies\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Social media should never be used in a way that violates any other EPAM policy or employee obligation. If your social media activity would violate any of EPAM's policies in another forum, it will also violate them in an online forum. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"No Expectation of Privacy\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All contents of EPAM's IT resources and communications systems are the property of EPAM. Therefore, employees should have no expectation of privacy whatsoever in any social media post, conversation or message, or any other kind of information or communications transmitted to, received or printed from, or stored or recorded on EPAM's devices, network, or communications systems.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Business Use of Social Media\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM owns all social media accounts used on behalf of EPAM or in the scope of your employment, including any and all log-in information, passwords, and content associated with each account, such as followers and contacts and will retain all such information and content pursuant to its own business needs. It is important that you not engage in EPAM business on any personal social media account, and that you not engage in any personal activity on an EPAM social media account.  If your job duties require you to speak on behalf of EPAM in a social media environment, you must seek approval and confirm the appropriate account from which to communicate, and the parameters of what can be communicated, from your supervisor. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Responsible Use of Social Media\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The following guidelines will ensure you use social media responsibly, and in the best interests of you and EPAM. These guidelines add to, and do not contradict, limit, or replace, applicable laws and contractual obligations. Our guidelines:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Respect Confidentiality\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\":  EPAM restricts employees' use and disclosure of the company's trade secrets, confidential information, and intellectual property. You should not do anything to jeopardize or unwittingly disclose such information through use of social media. Also, you should be mindful that the identity of any EPAM client may be confidential under a Non-Disclosure Agreement, so never reveal the identity of an EPAM client on social media without express permission from the respective Account Leadership.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Internet Is A Public Space:  \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Remember, everything you post to the internet can be viewed by journalists, consumers, customers, your supervisor, and the competition. If you are unsure, please contact People Management.
